name: Integration for Pipedrive and Contact Form 7, WPForms, Elementor, Ninja Forms
author: CRM Perks.

sections.description:
Contact Form 7 Pipedrive extension sends form submissions from Contact Form 7, WPforms, Elementor Forms, Ninja Forms, Formidable Forms, Contact Form Entries and many other popular contact form plugins to Pipedrive when anyone submits a form. Learn more at crmperks.com

Contact form 7 Pipedrive integration

  • Go to “Pipedrive Accounts” tab then add new account.
  • Go to “Pipedrive Feeds” tab then create a new feed.
  • Map required pipedrive fields to contact form fields.
  • Send your test entry to pipedrive by clicking “send to pipedrive” button.
  • Go to “Pipedrive Logs” tab and verify status of previously sent entry.

Connect Pipedrive CRM account

Connect any contact form 7 to Pipedrive account by simply entering Pipedrive API key. Additionally, you can connect multiple Pipedrive accounts to Contact Form 7.

Map Pipedrive fields

Select any pipedrive Object then Map pipedrive Object fields to any contact form 7 fields. Plugin displays all pipedrive fields.

Filter contact form 7 submissions

Filter contact form 7 submissions sent to Pipedrive based on user input. For example , send those customers to Pipedrive who check “Subscribe to newsletter” checkbox.

Manually send to Pipedrive

Send contact form 7 submissions to Pipedrive when someone submits a contact form. You can manually send contact form 7 submissions to Pipedrive by clicking “Send to Pipedrive” button.

Pipedrive logs

View a detailed log of each contact form 7 submission Whether sent or not sent to Pipedrive and easily resend contact form 7 submission to Pipedrive.

Send Data As Pipedrive Contact Notes

Send one to many contact form 7 form fields as Pipedrive Object notes when someone submits a contact form on your site.

Create Or Update Contact in Pipedrive

If a Contact already exists in Pipedrive , update it otherwise create a new Contact in Pipedrive.

Premium Version Features.

Following features are available only in premium version Contact Form 7 Pipedrive Pro.

  • Phone number field, Marketing Status field and all custom fields of Pipedrive.
  • Create Leads in Pipedrive CRM.
  • Create Organizations and Deals in Pipedrive.
  • Assign Organizations and Deals to Contacts in Pipedrive.
  • Assign Owner to Contacts, Organizations and Deals in Pipedrive.
  • Google Analytics Parameters and Geolocation of a visitor who submitted the form.
  • Lookup lead’s email and phone using email and phone lookup apis.
  • 20+ premium addons

Need Pipedrive Plugin for Gravity Forms ?

We have a separate addon for integrating Gravity Forms and Pipedrive CRM Gravity Forms Pipedrive

Need Pipedrive Plugin for Woocommerce ?

We have Pipedrive add-on for Woocommerce. Woocommerce Pipedrive Plugin

Want to send data to crm

We have Premium Extensions for 20+ CRMs.View All CRM Extensions
sections.faq:
Where can I get support?

Our team provides free support at https://www.crmperks.com/contact-us/.

How to integrate contact form 7 with pipedrive

You can easily integrate contact form 7 with pipedrive by following these steps.

  • Go to Pipedrive Accounts then connect your account.
  • Go to Pipedrive Feeds , select desired Object then map form fields to pipedrive Object fields.
  • Submit a contact form , a new member will added in pipedrive.
  • If you have installed Contact Form Entries plugin then open any entry and click “Send to Pipedrive” button.
  • Go to Pipedrive logs and check if entry was successfully sent to Pipedrive.

WPForms Pipedrive

  • Easily connect WPforms to our WPForms Pipedrive Integration Plugin.
  • Create feeds for Pipedrive Contacts, Companies and Leads etc.
  • New WPForms submission will be automatically sent to your Pipedrive account.

Elementor form Pipedrive

  • Easily Connect Elementor forms to your Pipedrive account.
  • Create a feed for Pipedrive Contacts, Companies and Leads etc, select correct Elementor form and finally map fields in feed.
  • When someone submits Elementor form, submission will be automatically sent to your Pipedrive account.
  • You can manually send any Elementor forms entry to Pipedrive by clicking “send to Pipedrive” button.

Ninja Forms Pipedrive

  • Easily connect Ninja Forms to your Pipedrive account.
  • After connecting Pipedrive account, create a feed for Contacts, Companies and Leads etc.
  • New Ninja Forms submission will be automatically sent to your Pipedrive account.
  • You can manually send any Ninja Forms entry to Pipedrive by clicking “send to Pipedrive” button.

Formidable Forms Pipedrive

  • Connect your Pipedrive account with our Pipedrive plugin.
  • Create feeds for any Pipedrive Object like Contacts, Companies and Leads etc. Select correct Formidable Form in feed.
  • New Formidable Form submission will be automatically sent to your Pipedrive account.
  • You can manually send any Formidable Form entry to Pipedrive by clicking “send to Pipedrive” button.
sections.changelog:
1.2.0

  • fixed “elementor form missing” issue.

1.1.9

  • fixed “Marketing Status” issue.
  • added elementor, wpforms and ninja forms.

1.1.8

  • fixed “org_id type string” issue.

1.1.7

  • added “only update empty fields” feature.

1.1.6

  • fixed “custom fields search” issue.

1.1.5

  • added “send any field to pipedrive from REQUEST” feature.

1.1.4

  • fixed “product fields from deal feed” issue.

1.1.3

  • fixed “fields removed from feed” issue.

1.1.2

  • added “lead notes” feature.

1.1.1

  • fixed “add field” button not working issue.

1.1.0

  • fixed “debug xss” issue.

1.0.9

  • added “stage id” feature.
  • fixed multiselect field issue.

1.0.8

  • added file upload feature.

1.0.7

  • fixed “set” field.

1.0.6

  • fixed multiple lines issues in notes.

1.0.5

  • fixed “enum and set” fields.

1.0.4

  • fixed lead label issue.

1.0.3

  • fixed custom field options.

1.0.2

  • fixed file field warning.

1.0.1

  • fixed “assign owner” issue.
  • added “Leads” object.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.

sections.reviews:
Great plugin

By desine on December 18, 2023

Very easy to setup and worked perfectly.

Does everything we needed.

By establishedgroup on December 10, 2023

Simple and intuitive. Easily mapped a lengthy form into a PipeDrive Contact, Organisation & Deal.

Great plugin, exactly what I needed.

By dmytroivan on November 30, 2023

Needed the plugin to send the data from Ninja Forms to Pipedrive. I couldn't map the hidden fields, so I wrote to support. Guys fixed it like within 2 days, so I can use plugin's full power now. Thanks for the great plugin and mega support.

The most promising plugin

By millscreativesingapore on September 11, 2023

I must say this is the most promising plugin. It brings the best value to a form operation. The integration with pipedrive is seamless and logical. Worth to pay to get works done!

A perfect integration between Contact Form 7 & Pipedrive

By pdbemail on June 29, 2023

This review is for the premium/paid version

CRM Perks Integration for Contact Form 7 and Pipedrive makes it quick and efficient to integrate one of the most popular WordPress form builders and one of the easiest to use KANBAN style CRMs.

Whilst Pipedrive can be connected to via Zapier, this direct WordPress integration is far better. It provides full reporting for every submission and gives you multiple options regarding duplicate handling. You also will not have to worry about the monthly Zapier costs, if you have a busy website getting many submissions.

The team are responsive and they also have a number of other decent looking CRM integrations for WordPress, they clearly know what they are doing.

Good Support

By sebastiang1982 on May 7, 2023

best plugin for connecting Pipedrive to contact form 7

Does exactly what I needed for PipeDrive

By rob.wheatley on January 20, 2023

I wanted to automatically create deals in PipeDrive based on form submissions. More than that, I also wanted to collect the Source of the lead so I can work out where leads are coming from and if we are putting our advertising spend in the right places.

This did the trick perfectly.

very easy to install

By oxygencenter on October 27, 2022

user friendly. not only for develepors

Amazing

By linadisoft on October 11, 2022

Amazing plugin

Great plugin

By myprintoo on May 4, 2022

Great plugin for the integration of contact forms within Pipedrive CRM. Everything works fine.
